name: query2-rule-001_4
description: Detects potentially suspicious sign-in attempts to Azure AD from unusual locations or with uncommon user agents.
query: event.dataset:azure.signinlogs and event.category:authentication and event.outcome:failure and (user_agent.original:*unusual_browser* or source.geo.country_name:*UncommonCountry*)
author: Elastic
false_positives: Legitimate users may occasionally sign in from new locations or using different browsers.
